Translations.Text: Dang shizhemen lai dao lu te de jiali de shihou
ta shuo:“Nimen que shi yixie mosheng de ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ba tamen yixiang zhenglun de (xingfa) dai lai gei nile
Women ba zhenli dai lai gei nile, women que shi chengshi de
Ni yingdang daizhe ni de jiazu zai shenye chuxing, ni yao gen zai tamen de houmian. Nimen zhong de renhe ren ye buyao huitou kan. Nimen yingdang qianjin, yizhidaoda nimen fengming daoda di difang.”
Wo qishi ta zhe ge panjue: Jiushi zhe deng ren, zai zaochen jiang bei genchu
Cheng li de jumin xinran er lai
ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao lingru wo
nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, nimen buyao xiuru wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni yu shiren wanglai ma?”
Ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de nu'er, ruguo nimen yao gan shenme shi.”
Zhi ni de shouming fashi, tamen bi jiang fanghuang yu ziji de diankuang zhi zhong
Nahan sheng zai ri chu shi xijile tamen
Wo jiu shi nage shi zhen tianfandifu, bing shi tao shixiang yudian ban jiangluo zai tamen shenshang
Duiyu neng kaocha zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Nage shi zhen que shi zai yitiao rengran cunzai de daolu shang de
Duiyu xindao zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Na conglin de jumin que shi bu yi de
guwo chengzhile tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de daolu shang
